subSections.title: Readings
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|へい}}

# a [[soldier]]
# a war machine; a [[weapon]]
# a [[war]]
# a [[soldier]], but not [[officer]]; [[private]]; [[corporal]]; [[lance corporal]]

{{ja-noun|つわもの}}

# a war machine; a [[weapon]]
# military [[ration]]
# a brave and strong [[warrior]]
# a [[stubborn]] person

{{ja-noun|ひょう}}

# another name for {{ja-r|歩|ふ}} in [[shogi]]
